title: Cycle Science Westville- Bicycle service and repair shop
text:
Cycle Science Westville 
Bicycle Service & Repairs 
1 Link road,  Westville, Durban 

Our workshop situated at the Westville Country Club at the Eco trails opposite Cadence. No 1 Link Road, Westville.

We offer the following services at competitive rates: 

Major Service 
Minor Service 

FREE Bike collection and delivery anywhere in Durban and surrounds 

Additional Services:
• Suspension Service - Quotation depending on work needed
• Wheel Hub Service 
• Wheel truing 
• Gear/Derailleur Calibration 
• All repairs and general maintenance
• Wash and Lube 
• Custom Bike builds
• Full Bicycle restorations
• Replacement parts fitted 

Minor Service:
• Wash n Lube
• Overall diagnostic check
• Front and rear Gears reset
• True Rims
• Check all pivots and moving parts 

Major service - includes Minor service plus:
• Full frame strip down and clean
• Chain & cassette removed & cleaned
• Bottom bracket & headset service
• Derailleurs cleaned & lubed
• Pivot bearings & bushings serviced
• Replace gear cables. 

Contact
Jason at Cycle Science
0815310901
1 Link road, Westville.
cyclesciencekzn@gmail.com
https://cyclescience.business.site/
https://fb.me/cyclesciencekzn

title: ***DARRVIN CREST E-BIKE 29R***
text: E+ MTB Hardtail | Urban, Commuting, Touring, MountainSeamless integration upgrade - choose from four configurations.Simple | Sport | City | Touring.OPTIONAL EXTRA: Darrvin Clip on Fender Set, Darrvin Pannier Rack, Darrvin Trunk Bag, Side Stand, Kenda Kwick Journey Commuter Tyre 700x40c.Upgrades include an updated frame geometry with a fully integrated battery, tapered headset, adjustable air suspension fork and wider gear range. Our most versatile model yet.WARRANTY: 1 Year Motor and Battery, 5 Years FrameAVAILABILITY: South Africa (As of August 2021)MODEL YEAR: 2022FEATURESConfidence inspiring MTB frame geometry with 29’’ wheels to smooth the trail.Powerful and responsive Bafang 350W mid motor with ISIS Drive axle for added strength.Front Suspension fork with a remote lock-out.Ultra reliable BAFANG 1 x 9 drive-train with a wide gear range .Aggressive tyres fitted to extra wide rims invite you to get rowdy. With a wider bar and sport orientated components the CREST packs more options than a Swiss army knife. GENERAL NOTES ON RANGE: Predicting range depends on a number of factors: eg. someone who weighs about 70Kg, riding across varied terrain with moderate undulation and a steady cadence of 70-80 rpm can control the range through battery management using the mode settings afforded by the control system. He/She could expect to get anything between 80-120Km from a single battery charge. Visit our FAQ Page for more general Q&A’s.SPECSFRAME: DARRVIN EVO Lite Alloy 29erFRONT FORK: MOZO Mag 29er Air Lock-Out 100mmCHAIN WHEEL: Bafang D-Tech 36T	CHAIN: KMC X9 E Optimised	PEDALS: Wellgo MTB GripHEADSET: D-Tech Sealed Taper Semi IntegratedHANDLEBAR: Promax Comfort Rise 700mmHANDLEBAR STEM: Promax 60/75mm alloy		GRIP/TAPE: Darrvin Trail Touch	BRAKE SET: Darrvin Apex Hydraulic 160mmHUB SET: Darrvin Forged Alloy 32h	RIM: D-Tech Double Wall 29erSPOKE: Stainless Steel black		TIRE: Kenda Slant Six 29 x 2.25	REAR DERAILLEUR: Shimano Altus M2000 SGS 9 Speed	DERAILLEUR LEVER SET R/H: Shimano SLM 2010 Rapid Fire Plus		GEARS: Shimano HG201 11-36T 9 Speed		SADDLE: Darrvin Comfort Sport		SEAT POST: Promax Micro AdjustSEAT CLAMP: D-Tech Quick ReleaseOPTIONAL EXTRA: Darrvin Clip on Fender Set, Darrvin Pannier Rack, Darrvin Trunk Bag, Side Stand, Kenda Kwick Journey Commuter Tyre 700x40c.NOTES ON WEIGHT: A really lightweight mid-range e-bike weighs in at around 21-23Kg, provided its a standard 250watt mid-drive motor model with 300-500Wh battery. A super light carbon MTB e-bike with roughly the same motor and battery might come in at 18-20Kg. For instance a top end R 150 000 ($10 000 USD) Specialized e-bike weighs just over 20Kg. The weight is a consideration if you need to transport the bike on a rack or in the back of your vehicle, but removing the battery might save 4-5Kg already when attempting to lift the bike. Either way, at the moment there is not really a significant difference in weight between most of the available e-bikes in the market. Darrvin’s lightweight aluminum-alloy frame and compact components make for one of the lighter e-bike configurations out there in its price class and with the battery removed is an easy lift onto any bike rack.Mechanical Guarantee: All components will be in a very reasonable to new condition on pre-owned bikes. Electric Mountain Biking with Cape Lion e-Rides offers the most e-xciting way to get around mountain biking trails this summer - e-MTB! If you are new to e-biking, it's like cycling, but without the grind. 
E-MTBs offer a little more push uphills and little more fun on the downhills. If you haven't tried it yet, what are you waiting for?
Discover the trails of Constantia, Silvermine, Table Mountain National Park and more.  
OUR E-MTBsHard Tail or Full Suspension available

Maximum rider weight, 150 Kg

That said these rims can easily handle trail riding too, they’re strong: DT Swiss XR391 29” rims 25mm ID (stickers removed). Aivee boost ltd ed chrome lightweight hubs from France. Cost R15k new. Hand built by www.wheelbuilder.co.za. Can sell with Shimano SLX 12sp cassette, rotors RT56, Schwalbe Racing Ray 2.25” tubeless tyres, KMC 12sp chain (all parts also 2 rides max) at additional cost, contact for custom quote. Reason for selling = anything not mission critical must go. Reasonable offers considered. Please no silly offers, show respect for a man’s time and goods. Thanks.

Description "Fuga Plus 2021 Cycling Helmet"

Perfect helmet for high demands in cyclocross and road cycling. This helmet is characterised by MIPS brain protection system, Halo 3D adjustment system and an unparalleled ventilation. The removable visor changes your look when needed for MTB or road biking.

light and stable In-Mold construction with light Polycarbonate Microshell outer shell

the integrated MIPS protection system absorbs and dispenses rotational forces in case of a diagonal impact Convincing protection from traumatic brain injuries!

very good ventilation thanks to inside air flow channels and large holes in front and back

excellent comfort due to innovative HALO one-hand adjustment system which allows for easy individual adjustment to the shape of your head

bacteriostatic X-Static liner pads

removable visor

reflective sticker

sizes: M (55-59), L (59-61)

weight: 280 g (size M)

Cycle Science Westville 
Bicycle Service & Repairs 
1 Link road,  Westville, Durban 

Our workshop situated at the Westville Country Club at the Eco trails opposite Cadence. No 1 Link Road, Westville.

We offer the following services at competitive rates: 

Major Service 
Minor Service 

FREE Bike collection and delivery anywhere in Durban and surrounds

title: Thule ClipOn3 *LIKE NEW*
text:
Retails for R3000+ at major retailer, you can get it in almost new condition for only R2000.

Thule's Clip On 9104 Bike Rack ia an easy-to-use, hanging-style trunk bike rack designed for station wagons and hatchbacks and will store 3 bikes with relative ease. It is easily mountable due to Thule's unique snap-on system and the rubber coated components ensure that your bike and car paint will not be damaged by this bike rack in any way.

Key Features:
- All parts in contact with the car and bikes are coated with rubber for extra protection.
- Easy to mount to the rear door with a unique snap-on system.
- Quickly folds for easy storage.
- Possible to attach Thule Light board 976.
- Use Thule Bike Frame Adapter 982 for fitting of bikes with non-standard frames (e.g. ladies’ bikes, BMXs, downhill bikes)
- This product does not have universal fit and it comes in two versions (9103 and 9104) having different tube diameters fitting different car models
- Max load capacity is 45kg with each bike weighing in at a maximum of 15kg each
- Dimensions(cm): 57 x 82 x 116 (Folded: 57 x 18 x 117)
- Weight: 7.1kg

BASED IN FLORIDA NORTH.

title: New Santa Cruz grips for sale
text: DESCRIPTIONDesigned and tested by us, the Palmdale Grips are the new home for your hands on Santa Cruz Bicycles.Single lock-ring design with the staying power of dual lock-ring. A taper-lock core uses an internal sleeve that narrows towards the last 38mm (1.5”) of the grip, effectively clamping onto the end of the bar to eliminate twisting.Flared closed end for comfort, feel and security. 8mm (0.3”) of rubber with a subtle mushroom profile on the tip resists scuffing, provides comfort and adds an intuitive feel for the bar end. (We also found it adds a healthy dose of forgiveness when clipping trees on tight trails!)Long grip length and waffle knurl for maximum control. A generous 125mm (4.9”) grip length (excluding lock-ring) allows plenty of room to reposition hands on differing terrain and long rides. The moto-knurl pattern gives just the right balance of feel and grip in all conditions.	R 300-00PIERRE  0726553812

title: Urbanlite e-ride adjustable helmet
text: Product description Rekd protection Urbanlite E-RideREKD have taken their Urbanlite helmet to the max with Urbanlite E-ride. Certified to NTA 8776, a safety standard designed especially for S-EPAC / E-bike riders, Urbanlite E-ride helmet is there to keep you safe whether you’re commuting to work or just out for a ride on your E-bike.- Urbanlite E-Ride is packed with premium features such as a FIDLOCK® magnetic buckle, allowing for super easy and stylish fastening, as well as their heat-stamped anti-bacterial padding and Twist-Fit Retention System to help you find the perfect fit. With safety-enhancing features such as a battery light with solid and flashing settings as the adjuster dial, as well as stickers and logos and reflective strips inside the straps, helping you become more visible to other road users in low light situations, Urbanlite E-ride is the ultimate Urban focussed helmet with E-bikes and road safety in mind.Features:- Heat stamped anti-bacterial lined padding- Reflective front and rear logos- Custom branded REKD Protection strap dividers- Light-up Twist-Fit Retention System for the perfect fit- 12 vent holes for optimum airflow- Built-in weather peak- FIDLOCK® magnetic buckle- Additional reflective stickers included- Certified for use with e-bikes- Suitable for a wide range of action sportsSpecifications:Construction and Materials:- High-density Expanded Polystyrene (EPS) inner core- Durable Polycarbonate (PC) outer shell- Hardwearing Nylon webbing strap with Nylon buckle- Anti-bacterial lined padding- Product Weight: 325gAt this moment, the product Rekd protection Urbanlite E-Ride is in stock at xtremeinn. Find out what other extreme sports products, the brand Rekd protection has at your online extreme sports store. Make any outfit your own with this season´s selection of Helmets models. Fully sealed bearings and a ton of Fit components round the Fit PRK off creating a bike that will tear skate parks to shreds.

title: Ryder Bora 2.0 UK9 + MTB Shimano Pedals + Cleates
text:
Retails for R1800 at Cyclelab. You can get it for half price with a free set of used MTB Pedals.

The Ryder Bora 2.0 MTB Cycling Shoe offers the comfort and quick adjustment provided by a A-Top dial. With a single dial and a set-and-forget front strap, it should be convenient for the rider to be able to slip on this shoe and hit the trails. The A-top dial offers 1mm adjustment increments when tightening with macro release function. The co-moulded nylon and rubber lugged outsole provides high traction and durability to this shoe, ensuring that it will be suitable for varying terrains.

Features:

- Rigid MTB sole to protect the rider and increase power transfer from the rider to the pedals
- A-top fastening system for an adjustable, custom fit
- Breathable mesh to keep the rider cool
- Rubber non-slip heel lining to increase the stability of the rider

BASED IN FLORIDA NORTH.
